hero.title: Control work time. Increase team productivity.
hero.description: KickAider automatically tracks employee activity, detects late arrivals and idle time — without manual reports or extra questions.

aboutCompany.title: About company
aboutCompany.text: KickAider is an employee time monitoring system. The agent is installed once on a computer and runs in the background collecting activity data: which apps and websites are open, mouse movement, and keyboard activity. Managers see everything in a convenient web dashboard — anytime, from any device.
aboutCompany.description: We created KickAider for teams that value transparency: no real-time surveillance, only objective working time data.

features.title: Increase team productivity
features.description: See how work time is actually used. KickAider automatically collects data and turns it into clear reports — without surveys, spreadsheets, or guesswork.

basicReports.title: Basic reports
basicReports.description: Company-wide analytics: top apps and websites, active vs idle time ratio. Filter by departments and employees.

activityHistory.title: Activity history
activityHistory.description: Minute-level timeline for every employee. Screenshots are captured automatically when switching apps — so you can always reconstruct the day.

ratingAndDetails.title: Ratings and daily details
ratingAndDetails.description: Employee efficiency ranking and detailed breakdown of each workday: arrival time, active time, and apps used.

insightsAndRecommendations.title: Insights and recommendations
insightsAndRecommendations.description: The system detects productivity patterns, highlights time-loss areas, and provides actionable recommendations to improve team efficiency.

carousel.title: Everything under control — in real time
carousel.text: Employee online statuses, alerts about lateness or long idle time, and timesheets with schedules — KickAider provides a complete picture without extra effort.

clients.title: Trusted by managers
clients.text: KickAider is used by companies that value transparent time analytics — without complex setup or IT departments.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about KickAider.

questions.question: How is the agent installed on an employee computer?
questions.answer: The agent is installed once on the employee’s Windows computer. After installation, it runs in the background and automatically sends data to the company server.

questions.question: Do employees know they are being monitored?
questions.answer: This can be configured. The agent can run in a visible mode (employees know about the system) or hidden mode — depending on manager preference.

questions.question: Is data stored on KickAider servers?
questions.answer: No. KickAider is deployed on your company infrastructure. All data is stored on your side — we do not have access to it.

questions.question: Which operating systems are supported?
questions.answer: The agent works on Windows. The manager web dashboard is accessible from any browser on any device.
